div.p: I’m sort of in a transitional period, I’m going on to my Part Two studying architecture so I’m moving houses again, I’m getting
my independence back actually because I’ve spent the last year living at my guardians’ house so it’s effectively going back to your parents.
I like to dibble-dabble in graphic design so I like to do sort of logos and typefaces and photography; I really want to buy
a film camera at the moment because Brighton’s got a dark room as well so I’d like to learn how to develop film photography
and maybe give me a better understanding of how to take better photos. I try to get out and travel when I can whether it’s across
the UK or whether it’s a trip abroad or something like that but you know it’s not like a typical holiday where you go and sit on a beach
it’s like trying to get involved in whatever’s going on there culturally whatever so but yeah that’s it really that’s what I like to do in my spare time
whatever I can when I can
